plot: The Galran Empire has launched a full-scale invasion of Altea, and the group needs to form Golion in order to stop them. But they must first retrieve the keys to the 5 lions, located beneath the castle in the crypt of the late King Raimon.
title: "Hyakujû-ô Goraion" Bôrei to itsutsu no kagi
plot_es: The Galran Empire has launched a full-scale invasion of Altea, and the group needs to form Golion in order to stop them. But they must first retrieve the keys to the 5 lions, located beneath the castle in the crypt of the late King Raimon.
original_name: "Hyakujû-ô Goraion" Bôrei to itsutsu no kagi
plot_en: The Galran Empire has launched a full-scale invasion of Altea, and the group needs to form Golion in order to stop them. But they must first retrieve the keys to the 5 lions, located beneath the castle in the crypt of the late King Raimon.
